r.s: The PEAR Numbers_Words package provides methods for spelling numerals in words.
r.d:
With Numbers_Words class you can convert numbers written in arabic digits to words in several languages. You can convert an integer between -infinity and infinity. If your system does not support such long numbers you can call Numbers_Words::toWords() with just a string.
The following languages are supported (in alphabetical order): * de (German) * es (Spanish) by Xavier Noguer * en_100 (Donald Knuth system, English) * en_US (American English) * en_GB (Britich English) * pl (Polish) * pt_BR (Brazilian Portuguese) by Marcelo Subtil Marcal
r.n: Fixing native language name for pt_BR (Brazilian Portuguese).
